pullrequest.title: Model submission for Husky sensor configuration 1 from team CoSTAR

content.raw: Yeah, this seems to be the case with all of the DepthCloud visualization of the rgbd cameras.  The DepthCloud visualizer generates a point cloud based on RGB and depth images and assumes that the +z direction of the frame is the front of the camera. However, the cameras in ign-gazebo assume +x to be the front. It shouldn't be an issue for competitors because the point cloud message (not the one from DepthCloud) has the correct rotation.
content.html: Yeah, this seems to be the case with all of the DepthCloud visualization of the rgbd cameras. The DepthCloud visualizer generates a point cloud based on RGB and depth images and assumes that the +z direction of the frame is the front of the camera. However, the cameras in ign-gazebo assume +x to be the front. It shouldn't be an issue for competitors because the point cloud message (not the one from DepthCloud) has the correct rotation.
